meanings.sent1: She rethinks her decision before making a choice.
meanings.sent2: He often rethinks his plans to make sure they are right.
meanings.sent3: The cat rethinks jumping after seeing the height of the wall.
meanings.sent4: The student rethinks her approach to studying after failing the test.
meanings.sent5: The detective rethinks the case, looking for missed clues.
